DOC.brief_title: Spinal Morphine Robotic Assisted Radical Prostatectomy
DOC.detailed_description: This study randomize control trial . It randomize 160 patient schedule Robot-Assisted Radical Prostatectomy . The intervention group receive single spinal injection bupivacaine ( 12,5 mg ) /morphine ( 300 mcg ) mixture . Controlgroup receive subcutaneous injection lidoca√Øne placebo purpose intravenous load dose morphine end surgery . Both group receive general anesthesia surgery standardized fashion . After surgery , group receive Patient-Controlled Analgesia pump post-operative pain control . Primary outcome patient satisfaction measure Quality-of-Recovery-15 questionnaire . This questionnaire take baseline , day 2 1 week surgery . Secundary outcome morphine use per PCA , duration hospital stay , side-effects ease surgery .
